events.message: I received a product that I didn't like, and I want to get a refund. The item was not what I expected.
The customer's request was identified as a refund issue based on their dissatisfaction with the received product.
A customer service representative specializing in refunds was assigned to handle the customer's case.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product did not meet the description and I am unhappy with its quality.
Thank you for the details. We can offer a full refund once the item is returned. I will send you the return shipping label.
That sounds good, thank you. I appreciate the quick response and the assistance provided so far.
The refund process has been initiated and the return shipping label has been sent to your email. Let us know if you need further help.
We are checking in to confirm that you received the refund and that everything was resolved to your satisfaction.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
